author: Juan Perez Jr. and Marie J. French
title: ‘There will be death’: Trump warns of ‘toughest week’ ahead
description: The president told the country to brace for the coming apex of the coronavirus outbreak.
content:
But he signaled his growing impatience with the stringent social distancing measures states have put in place around the country, which have sent the economy spiraling rapidly downward. 
"We have to open our country again," Trump said. "We have to open our c… [+4540 chars]
